It went to congress.
People won.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54eff3b16368722239f41d00#post_54eff3b16368722239f41d00
This is incorrect.
There was no market failure being addressed.
The FCC wants more regulatory power and it got it.
The companies that benefit from NN supported it.

For now you probably wont see any change.
For now.

Also george soros paid for this grassroots movement so it's puppet populism
